ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Girls
ygData.msgSnippet: I know at least one guy who played a female bc he got off on watching her in 3rd person mode. luv, -Su I have been playing EQ since the betas and I am female.
ygData.messageBody:
I know at least one guy who played a female bc he got off on watching her in
3rd person mode.
luv,
-Su

I have been playing EQ since the betas and I am female. =) Back in the
good ole days they said that is was 1/3 to Â½ actual female RPGers in
game.not sure about now-a-days though. I know there are a ton of female
characters played by guys, which I don't really understand. Are there
really that many men who secretly want to be female? *grin* Just
kidding.
